description: A shell script containing unit tests for various functions related to file timestamps, SHA1 sums, MAC addresses, and filename composition, primarily used for crash dump upload functionality.

methods.name: testLastModifiedTimeOfFileResultIsNotEmptyIfFileExists
methods.description: Tests that the get_last_modified_time_of_file function returns a non-empty timestamp for an existing file.

methods.name: testLastModifiedTimeOfFileResultIsEmptyIfFileDoesNotExist
methods.description: Tests that the function returns an empty timestamp for a non-existent file.

methods.name: testLastModifiedTimeOfFileResultLengthEquals19
methods.description: Asserts that the timestamp length equals 19 characters.

methods.name: testSha1LengthEquals40
methods.description: Verifies that the SHA1 sum generated is exactly 40 characters long.

methods.name: testSha1HasDefaultValue
methods.description: Checks that the default SHA1 sum is all zeros when no file path is provided.

methods.name: testFileSizeIsChanged
methods.description: Tests detection of file size changes during a background process.

methods.name: testFileSizeIsNotChanged
methods.description: Checks that no change is detected when touching a file without modifications.

methods.name: testMacHasDefaultValue
methods.description: Asserts that the default MAC address is zeros.

methods.name: testMacIsNotNullUsingMockFunction
methods.description: Tests that a mock MAC address is correctly set.

methods.name: testMacWithSpacesGetsDefaultValue
methods.description: Ensures that a MAC address with spaces defaults to zeros.

methods.name: testMacContainsOnlyUpperCaseLetters
methods.description: Verifies that MAC addresses are converted to uppercase.

methods.name: testMacLengthIs12
methods.description: Checks that the MAC address length is exactly 12 characters.

methods.name: testSetDefaultTimestamp
methods.description: Verifies that the default timestamp is '2000-01-01-00-00-00'.

methods.name: testDumpTimestampLengthIs19
methods.description: Ensures that the dump timestamp length is 19 characters.

methods.name: testComposedFileNameIsNotEmpty
methods.description: Tests that the filename composition produces a non-empty result.

methods.name: testComposedFileNameDoesNotMatchExpectedName
methods.description: Checks that the generated filename matches the expected pattern based on variables.
